alert.note: Alert for Blount; Grainger; Jefferson; Knox; Sevier; Union (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 06 at 3:57PM CDT until May 06 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM EDT FOR KNOX...NORTH CENTRAL BLOUNT...WESTERN JEFFERSON...SOUTHWESTERN GRAINGER...NORTHWESTERN SEVIER AND SOUTHEASTERN UNION COUNTIES... At 457 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Plainview to 8 miles west of Pigeon Forge, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Knoxville, Sevierville, Maynardville, Plainview, New Market, Rockford, Strawberry Plains, Halls, Blaine and Luttrell. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 in Tennessee between mile markers 386 and 413. Interstate 75 in Tennessee near mile marker 108. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for east Tennessee. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Blount; Grainger; Jefferson; Knox; Sevier; Union
